name: Orange Glazed Chicken Wings
author: Casey
summary: You'll need more than one batch of these scrumptious little buggers if you are having a party or feeding the crowd. For extra nice texture and better crispiness, dredge in flour with salt, pepper, basil, and rosemary.
ingredients: 18  chicken wings, tips removed and wings cut in half at joint
directions: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Add the wing pieces, and fry until golden brown on all sides, about 6 to 10 minutes
Spoon off any excess fat, and add the orange marmalade, mustard, and soy sauce to the skillet, stirring to blend the ingredients and coat the wing pieces
Simmer on medium heat 8 to 10 minutes, until the sauce thickens and glazes the wings
